name: Smolest Ortholithos
description: Smol version of my photograph back from 2018. Ortholithos sited on the west side of Paxos. It is a huge "standing rock"(=Ortholithos) infront of a massive cave. There is a myth that Allies submarines hid there in order to camouflage themselves from Axis naval forces during WW2. 16x16px Photo by George Angelis.
